controlPanel.header: Dota 2 Ability Draft Plus - Control Panel

status.title: Application Status
status.resolutionsMismatch: Your resolution {systemRes} is not supported. Defaulting to {defaultRes}.
status.resolutionsNone: No supported resolutions found. Please submit your layout.

activation.title: Overlay Activation
activation.label: Select screen resolution for scanning:
activation.helpText: This resolution must match your Dota 2 game setting.
activation.description: Activate the overlay. You can do it before starting game or before game search. It would stay in standby mode until you click 'Initial Scan'.

newResolution.title: Submit New Layout
newResolution.description: If your screen resolution isn't listed, you can submit your current screen setup. Please ensure Dota 2 is in the Ability Draft phase, displaying the full draft interface, at the resolution you wish to add.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Fetch all hero, ability, and pair data from Windrun.io. This may take a few moments.

feedback.title: Feedback & Diagnostics
feedback.description: If the ML model misidentifies abilities, use the "Report Failed Recognition" feature in the overlay. You can then send these snapshots to developer for model improvement.

resolutionMismatch.message: Your resolution {systemRes} is not supported yet. Please change resolution to a supported one, or submit your resolution to be added.

screenshotPreview.title: Screenshot Preview
screenshotPreview.message: Is this screenshot of your draft screen correct?

initialScanConfirm.message: Ensure that the Draft is loaded and all abilities are visible on the screen.

reportConfirm.message: Want to report failed ability recognition? This will take a snapshot of all ability icons in the pool. You can send these snapshots to the developer via "Send Failed Samples" button in control panel to improve the model.

status.snapshotSuccess: Snapshot: {count} images saved to app data.

ipcMessages.overlayActivated: Overlay activated for {res}. Main window hidden.
ipcMessages.exportNoFiles: No image files found to export.
